wikipedia_page.main: Bradley Steven McStravick (born 25 May 1956) is a British athlete. He competed in the men's decathlon at the 1980 Summer Olympics and the 1984 Summer Olympics. McStravick represented Scotland at the 1982 and 1986 Commonwealth Games.
